newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Stockpile sells ferro-columbium to Considar.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Stockpile sells ferro-columbium to Considar.

text.p: U.S. Defense National Stockpile Center said it sold 19,580 lbs of contained columbium in ferro-columbium to Considar Inc for an approximate market value of $129,000.
This award exhausts Stockpile's authority to sell more material in the current fiscal year which ends Sept 30.
Authority for further sales in the current fiscal year has been requested and sales will resume upon approval of this request, Stockpile said.
